title: (Not Mine) So theres Soul Reaver Draven...how about Soul Reaver Vayne?
body:
Yes I know, Soul Reaver Draven makes no thematically sense to Draven...

But yeah I found this online...please excuse the 'view' of the ass it gives you...

replies.body: not going to happen as they produce skins to make teams soul reaver zed yasuo and talon would fit this though
That looks really nice on vayne, also provocative as well >:)(EHEHEHEHEHHE). I like the idea of the skin coming out so it's nice that you found it.
